ProjectsData.title: Vue Repo Fetcher
ProjectsData.description: This is a Github-Repo-Fetcher that uses the Github API to fetch repositories, has a search and filter functionality and includes pagination.
ProjectsData.stack: Vue.js, HTML, CSS (scoped styles), GitHub API

ProjectsData.title: Furniro E-commerce Website
ProjectsData.description: A fully functional ecommerce website for a furniture store.

ProjectsData.title: Chatter: Blogging Website
ProjectsData.description: Welcome to Chatter, a platform where your voice is amplified. Dive into a community-driven space for sharing and exploring meaningful content. Join us in creating a place where every word matters.

ProjectsData.title: Trafalgar Landing Page
ProjectsData.description: This project is a modern and responsive landing page created using Vue.js and pure CSS.

ProjectsData.title: Simple Timezone Converter
ProjectsData.description: This Web App displays the current time for up to 10 different time zones and even displays the local time of the user.
